class.name: position_controllers/PoseTrajectoryController
class.description: The PoseTrajectoryController executes cartesian-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to a position interface.

class.name: velocity_controllers/PoseTrajectoryController
class.description: The PoseTrajectoryController executes cartesian-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to a velocity interface.

class.name: effort_controllers/PoseTrajectoryController
class.description: The PoseTrajectoryController executes cartesian-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to an effort interface.

class.name: pos_vel_controllers/PoseTrajectoryController
class.description: The PoseTrajectoryController executes cartesian-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to an pos_vel interface.

class.name: pos_vel_acc_controllers/PoseTrajectoryController
class.description: The PoseTrajectoryController executes cartesian-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to an spline interface.
